Picnic Rescue

I'm sorry, we couldn't find your location. Please select your state to see recalls

Cass-Clay , Swiss Chip, 3 Gallon(11.34 L).

  • Recall Reason: Cass-Clay Creamery is voluntarily recalling a number of ice cream products because they may contain undeclared soy (lecithin).
  • Affected States: ND, AZ, MN, SD, KS
  • Report Date: 20120905
  • Classification: Class II
  • Product Code: all products that has a plant code of "38-25".
